wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier Gerald Ernest Thubron DSO OBE (13 July 1903 – 6 September 1992) was an officer in the British Army.

response: *1961–1966: Brig. Gerald Ernest Thubron, DSO, OBE
*1958–1959: Brig. Gerald Ernest Thubron, DSO, OBE
* Brigadier Gerald Ernest Thubron, son of Ernest Blakelock Thubron
